sentence.Network_en: There is also a group of verbs known as the semi deponent verb.
sentence.Network_cn: 另外有种动词称为半被动形主动义的动词(semideponentverbs).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin deponent- 'laying aside, putting down' (in medieval Latin 'testifying'), from the verb deponere, from de- 'down' + ponere 'place'. The use in grammar arose from the notion that the verb had ‘laid aside’ the passive sense (although in fact these verbs were originally reflexive)

means.word_mean: 1. a person who testifies or gives a deposition
